channel.title: Very important...rep ++ for help!
channel.description:
My server was working fine before, i'm not sure what I did to it, but now whenever i pick up a item "take" option, the item just dissapears... :confused:
> its not in my inventory > and its not on the floor after I "take" it
Please help...really aprreciate it :(

item.title: Very important...rep ++ for help!
item.dc:creator: @darkhazzard darkhazzard
item.description:
@darkhazzard wrote:

Im using Pimpscape scource
the last modifications I made was a new rep system (I think)

emo-cabbage-::pickup works just not the “take” button

Ex) A player on my server just pked someone but whenever he clicks on the items on the floor, he doesnt get them and it (the item) dissapears

For Example: Take coins(0995)
whenever u click on it, it just dissapears and doesnt appear in your inventory

Help would be greatly appreciated…Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Very important...rep ++ for help!
item.dc:creator: @emo-cabbage emo-cabbage
item.description:
@emo-cabbage wrote:

try using ::pickup (item id) (amount)

so lets say you want 15 santa hats

::pickup 1051 15 = 15 santas!

Read full topic
